What a wonderful idea! Featuring Emma in your collector spotlight section would be a great way to kick off this new feature on your blog. Her expertise in antique jewelry would undoubtedly fascinate your readers, and her personal story would likely resonate with many.

By featuring Emma, you'll not only be showcasing her knowledge and expertise but also highlighting the importance of women in the world of antiques and collectibles. It's essential to celebrate and recognize the contributions of women like Emma, who have made significant impacts in their respective fields.

Here are some potential questions you could ask Emma during the interview:

1. **What sparked your interest in antique jewelry?** Ask Emma to share the story of how she got started collecting antique jewelry, what drew her to it, and what keeps her passionate about it.
2. **What's your favorite piece in your collection, and why?** This question will give Emma the opportunity to share a personal story about a specific piece that holds sentimental value or significance.
3. **How do you stay up-to-date with market trends and developments in the world of antique jewelry?** This question will allow Emma to share her expertise and provide valuable insights into the industry.
4. **What advice would you give to someone just starting out in antique jewelry collecting?** Emma's response will offer valuable guidance and encouragement to your readers who are new to collecting.
5. **Can you share a particularly memorable or challenging experience you've had while collecting antique jewelry?** This question will give Emma the chance to share a personal anecdote that will engage and entertain your readers.

Remember to keep the tone of the interview conversational and friendly, allowing Emma's personality and expertise to shine through. You could also include photos of Emma with her collection, as well as images of some of her favorite pieces.

By featuring Emma in your collector spotlight section, you'll not only be celebrating her achievements but also providing a valuable resource for your readers. I'm sure your audience will love hearing her story and learning from her expertise!
